title: Vandha Kadha Lyrics Vai Raja Vai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Vai Raja Vai Vandha Kadha Pona Kadha Lyrics
Singer & Lyrics: Gana Bala
Music: Yuvan

Vandha Kadha vazhndha kadha
sondha kadha soga kadha

Vandha Kadha vazhndha kadha
sondha kadha soga kadha
enga poyi mudiyum
enakku mattum theriyum

vai raja vai
indha vazha oru poi
nee polaika rendu kai
naan solluradha sei (2)

Guess panni solluvenda
missu podum dress-a.
sketch-u pottu kaththu
tharuven naaliku varum test-a
test-a test-a test-a

touch-u panna nenachaakka
vachiduven check-a.
thottu kooda paakkaama
karaichi kudupen book-a

Vetti payyan enakku romba
pudicha game-u cricket-u.
vethu vettu evan vandhaalum
thudda koduthu sarikattu.

saththiyatha pesu
vaikkuren cut-out-u
soththu sugam gaaliyaana
monda uttu get-out-u

vai raja vai
indha vazha oru poi
nee polaika rendu kai
naan solluradha sei (2)

eththana mura porandaalum
ottura mannuthaan ottum.
ellarukku onnuthaanda
ezhudhi vachcha sattam.

Sattila soru indhaathaan
karandiyila maattum.
nee puttila paala vachcha
endha poona vandhu kudikkum

ulla veliya aattathula
onnaa number-u naanu,
kulla nariya vesam pottu
kaatta maatten sceneu.

vambu sandya vela koduthu
vaanga maattaen naanu.
varra sandaya podaamalae
vida maattaen naanu.

vai raja vai
indha vazha oru poi
nee polaika rendu kai
naan solluradha sei (2)
